room_title: Escape room "The Castle" by Amazing Escape Room in Bridgewater
room_address: 326 Route 22 West Suites 13/14B Green Brook, New Jersey, NJ 08812
room_description:
In the town of Transylvania, there are few castles that still stand in the background of the rolling hills. The Vladimirescu Castle is one of them. Believed to be abandoned, spikes in a recent activity have the town wondering if the last family member Dimitri is still lurking in the shadows.
Upon passing the Castleâ€™s gates, recently discovered the symbol of the legendary society that once rules the nightfall in Transylvania centuries before. Theorized that evidence of this society is hidden beyond the gates, you are tasked with entering the castle to discover if the truth will finally be revealed.
